title_advert: ['Single row modern THA in exclusive community']
location1: ['Club Villas at Dubai HillsDubai, Dubai Hills Estate']
amenities: ['Unfurnished\nBalcony']
descriptions:
['DescriptionPH Real Estate are delighted to be able to offer a THA Modern townhouse in a very good location within the Club Villas Community in Dubai Hills.
With handover in late 2020, this villa falls in line perfectly with Expo 2020.
The accomodation comprises an entrance hall, with powder room and laundry then the living space opens ups to a really nice open plan space giving two living areas, dining room and kitchen.
On the first floor, the master bedroom has its own walk in dressing room, en-suite bathroom and terrace.  Two further bedrooms share a separate shower room.
Outside, there is a terrace and open space in the rear garden, enjoying a good level of privacy as the property has no neighbours behind.   There is a further roof terrace for all properties.
To the front of the property is an are of covered parking for two vehicles
Club Villas is one of the most prestigious townhouse communities within Dubai Hills
Please call Martin Hyre +971567898722 or email martin@phrealestate.ae']

title_advert: ['Single row 1M directly onto pool and park']
amenities: ['Unfurnished\nBalcony']
descriptions:
['DescriptionPH Real Estate are very pleased to be able to offer this very well presented 1m villa in the best possible location in Mira 5, the most desirable of all of the Miras.
With 2347 sq ft of built up area, the 1M offers good accommodation for a family and as the property comes vacant on transfer, this property is perfect for a family looking to move soon.
The accommodation comprises an entrance hall, powder room, living room, kitchen, laundry and maid’s room on the ground floor.
On the first floor, the master bedroom has an en-suite bathroom and a walk in wardrobe.  Two further bedrooms share a jack and jill bathroom.
Outside, there is an attractive landscaped rear garden immediately backing onto the pool and park.
To the front of the property, there is off road parking for two vehicles.
Mira 5 is the most desirable of all of the Miras, with the largest park, it is also the most central of all five of the Miras.
Please call Martin Hyre +971567898722 or email martin@phrealestate.ae']
